root.name: Ardy Lightfoot
root.description: StoryIt's been found out that the rainbow has been destroyed into 7 pieces and it's up to him (and his companion Pec), to save the 7 gems which form the colors of the rainbow to restore them and prevent the main enemy Visconty from using it for his evil deeds.GameplayThe game is based on a platformer where the player controls Ardy on a 2D stage and can jump and attack either with Pec or can bounce one enemies heads with his tail. In some situations, Pec can also be used in other situations when Pec chages color like using Pec to destroy blocks or as a jetpack to fly through areas of a level.Stars can be collected in the game and with some automatically give 10 stars. If the player collects 100 stars, en extra life is granted.There are 10 levels on total with a steep difficulty on the level design itself.
